[38;2;255;255;255m⏺[39m Based on my analysis of the Coder1 IDE codebase, here's how to change the
  directory displayed in the explorer panel:

  [1mCurrent System[22m

  The file explorer currently shows files based on the [1mproject root [22m
  [1mdirectory[22m, which is determined by [38;2;177;185;249mprocess.cwd()[39m (the current working
  directory where the server is running). This is hardcoded in the file tree
   API at [38;2;177;185;249m/api/files/tree/route.ts:12[39m.

  [1mHow to Change the Explorer Directory[22m

  There are several approaches to implement directory switching:

  [2m
  Add a directory picker in the file explorer interface that allows users
  to:
  - Browse to different directories
  - Set a custom project root
  - Save preferred directory settings

  [2m
  Modify the [38;2;177;185;249m/api/files/tree[39m endpoint to accept a [38;2;177;185;249mrootPath[39m parameter,
  allowing the frontend to request different directories.

  [2m
  Add a [38;2;177;185;249mPROJECT_ROOT[39m environment variable to override the default
  [38;2;177;185;249mprocess.cwd()[39m behavior.

  [2m
  Add directory selection to the existing settings system, with persistence
  in browser localStorage.

  [1mCurrent Architecture[22m

  - [1mFile Tree API[22m: [38;2;177;185;249m/api/files/tree/route.ts[39m - Uses [38;2;177;185;249mprocess.cwd()[39m as root
  - [1mFile Explorer Component[22m: [38;2;177;185;249mSafeFileExplorer.tsx[39m - Fetches from
  [38;2;177;185;249m/api/files/tree[39m
  - [1mLeft Panel[22m: Contains the explorer in a tabbed interface
  - [1mSupported Files[22m: 20+ file extensions ([38;2;177;185;249m.js[39m, [38;2;177;185;249m.tsx[39m, [38;2;177;185;249m.md[39m, etc.)
  - [1mExcluded Directories[22m: [38;2;177;185;249mnode_modules[39m, [38;2;177;185;249m.git[39m, [38;2;177;185;249mbuild[39m, etc.

  [1mCurrent System[22m
